attributes.action: Further education students should not have to do English and Maths lessons when they already have a GCSE Grade C or above
attributes.additional_details:
Students that study at college will be forced to take part in Maths and English lessons even if they have already achieved a grade C or above when they studied at school.

This is unfair as they have already had to work to get the grades and they are then being forced to do it all over again.
